item.title: Install Tailscale
item.description:
for raspberry pi

sudo apt install curl -y

general installation

https://pkgs.tailscale.com/stable/#static

item.title: Using ROS2 over tailscale using Docker's Host-mode networking
item.description:
Introduction

This example shows you how to create a docker-compose based container that uses “host-mode” networking. Host mode networking can be simpler because it doesn’t have to be managed by docker itself. Just get your tailscale client up and running on the host computer, and your docker instance can use it.

item.title: Using ROS2 in a Docker container running Tailscale
item.description:
Introduction

This example shows you how to create a docker-compose based container that uses tailscale which has been installed within a container.

item.title: Using ROS2 over VPNs in the Classroom
item.description: The purpose of this tutorial is to provide a way to provide access to ROS2 style data collection between computers, when specific kinds of access to the users’ network is restricted.

item.title: OpenVPN3 for Ubuntu
item.description:
openvpn3 session-start --config ${MY_CONFIGURATION_FILE}
